comments.body: Man wtf this looks like they gave 8 yr old kids crayons and asked them to colour it
They weren't given permission to use printed banners. Stop the unnecessary trolling.
still looks shit

sustainability apparently
Blame the management

damn, theres no need to clown them for preparing that. I heard the management didnt allow them to use printed banners or sumn. If you think it looks like shit then maybe next time contribute and help?
Perhaps the entire budget was spent on AT
This is a very good initiative.Atleast the college is following a ecofriendly system
People won't like a positive comment here be careful 👀

the printed banners are really toxic for the environment.   
Would have been nice they gave the students more time to work on it tho.
given the timecrunch they were on, they lowkey kinda cooked 🔥
